content.body: Hey all! Could someone remind me of the current state of the Scopes proposal? From the latest notes I could find, I wrote that Simon Zünd and Holger Benl were feeling pretty good about the state of it but Justin Ridgewell wanted some more time to look at it before we attempted to proceed. Does that sound right?
content.formatted_body: Hey all! Could someone remind me of the current state of the Scopes proposal? From the latest notes I could find, I wrote that Simon Zünd and Holger Benl were feeling pretty good about the state of it but Justin Ridgewell wanted some more time to look at it before we attempted to proceed. Does that sound right?
